comments.html: Great article Ivan! One step that your reader could add is to verify the behavior of the ACL/Firewall ruleset that is generated. Batfish is a great tool for that. We have even created a Jupyter notebook to show users how to verify the ACL/Firewall change using Batfish - https://github.com/batfish/pybatfish/blob/master/jupyter_notebooks/Analyzing%20ACLs%20and%20Firewall%20Rules.ipynb
comments.name: Unknown
